Namespace FinSysPlatform.Domain.Market.Data

Classes

Abstract bars builder

Base class of bars period IBarSeries, IBarsType

Information about currently forming bar FormingBar

Structs

SeriesItem<T>

An item of ISeries<T>

Interfaces

IBarDataSource

An abstraction for bar data source. It is something which holds bars storage (BarStorage) and type of these bars

IBarSeries

Series of bars

IBarStorage

Interface for storing bars in RAM

IBarStorageReadAccessor

A read-only list of bars

IBarStorageWritable

Extended interface of the storage with update support

IBarsType

Describes the type of drawing

INotifySeriesValueChanged

Any series inherited from ISeriesBase can support notification

ISeriesBase

The untyped series which cannot provide an access to values of items (only DateTime is supported via MasterSource), but can answer whether value is set or not ISeriesMasterSource

ISeriesMasterSource

This is the very basic interface of series. Series is a collection of pairs DateTime, {T} items, where T can be of any type This interface supports only access to DateTime, but not value For full support see ISeries<T>

ISeriesWritable<T>

Writable version of ISeries<T>

ISeries<T>

ISeries T is an interface implemented by all Script classes that manage historical data as an ISeries double (Open, High, Low, Close, etc), used for indicator input, and other object data.

IStandardBarsPeriod

If BarsPeriod inheritor also supports this interface, then it means the period is of standard timeframe: tick, second, minute, hour etc and UnderlyingTimeframe in this case points to the the target timeframe Actually, for the time standard period, a standard StandardBarBuilder can be used

ITimedCollection

The abstraction of collection that operates items with date and time

SeriesStorageChangingEventType

Type of collection modification for IBarStorageWritable

TimeToIndexMappingMode

Mode to search bar by index. GetIndex(DateTime, TimeToIndexMappingMode)
